items.title: Arteta complimenteert niet alleen Martinelli, maar ook Slot
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli heeft zijn voeten laten spreken, zo oordeelde Mikel Arteta na het door Arsenal van Portsmouth gewonnen duel in de FA Cup . De Spaanse manager van The Gunners gaf niet alleen de Braziliaan, maar ook Arne Slot een compliment.

items.title: VI Live: El Cl√°sico in de finale van Spaanse Supercopa begonnen
items.summary: Welkom in de VI Live op deze ijskoude zondag 11 januari. Volg hier de ontwikkelingen binnen en buiten de grenzen, met op deze plek onder meer aandacht voor de Eredivisie, de finale van de Super Cup tussen Barcelona en Real Madrid en het FA Cup-toernooi.

items.title: United-beul Welbeck koestert warme herinneringen aan tussenpaus Fletcher
items.summary: Danny Welbeck heeft opnieuw toegeslagen tegen zijn favoriete tegenstander. De voormalig speler van Manchester United tekende voor de 0-2 namens Brighton, waardoor een vroegtijdige FA Cup-exit een feit was voor United.

items.title: Taylor speelt 90 minuten bij succesvol Lazio-debuut in Verona
items.summary: Kenneth Taylor heeft zijn eerste overwinning met Lazio te pakken. De 23-jarige middenvelder stond bijna de hele wedstrijd op het veld tijdens een krappe uitzege op Hellas Verona.

items.title: Martinelli hat-trick as Arsenal beat Portsmouth in FA Cup
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli scored a hat-trick as Arsenal overcame an early scare to thrash Championship strugglers Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Liverpool's Bradley out for season with knee injury
items.summary: Liverpool defender Conor Bradley is set to miss the rest of the season after suffering a serious knee injury in Thursday's 0-0 draw with Arsenal.

items.title: USMNT's Pepi suffers broken arm scoring for PSV
items.summary: United States striker Ricardo Pepi suffered a broken forearm while in action for PSV Eindhoven on Saturday and and is set to be sidelined for two months, the Dutch club has confirmed..

items.title: Man United knocked out of FA Cup after Welbeck strike
items.summary: Manchester United were eliminated from the FA Cup after a 2-1 third-round defeat to Brighton & Hove Albion on Sunday, with their former player Danny Welbeck among the goals.

items.title: Heracles weer hekkensluiter: 'Dit is een heel grote uitdaging'
items.summary: De hervatting van het seizoen draaide voor Heracles Almelo zondag uit op een deceptie. De ploeg van trainer Ernest Faber verloor met 2-0 van Sparta Rotterdam en kwam daardoor op doelsaldo weer op de laatste plek terecht in de Eredivisie. Heracles speelde erg weinig klaar op Het Kasteel, zag ook Faber.

items.title: Danny Welbeck shines as Brighton dump Manchester United out of FA Cup
items.summary: Manchester United‚Äôs hunt for trophies is over inside the second week of January after a ruthless Brighton took advantage of yet another loose defensive performance. This FA Cup third-round knockout means the 13-times winners have been dumped from the competition and the League Cup at the first opportunity for a first time since 1981-82. By the end of May United‚Äôs season will stand at a total of 40 games ‚Äì their lowest number in a complete campaign since 1914-15. If August‚Äôs Carabao Cup penalty shootout elimination at Grimsby was dire, this disappointment was as concerningly insipid, goals from Brajan Gruda and Danny Welbeck, one in each half, (probably) ending Darren Fletcher‚Äôs record as the interim manager as winless ‚Äì this defeat following Wednesday‚Äôs draw at Burnley in the Premier League. Continue reading...

items.title: Supercopa Clasico preview, predictions: Are Barcelona favorites vs. Real Madrid?
items.summary: Barcelona and Real Madrid meet in the Supercopa final Sunday, but who has the upper hand? Sam Marsden and Alex Kirkland preview the upcoming Clasico.

items.title: Magic Makama hat-trick as Norwich beat Walsall
items.summary: Twenty-one-year-old Jovon Makama scores a hat-trick as Norwich City beat Walsall in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Man Utd problems mount as Brighton book FA Cup fourth-round spot
items.summary: Manchester United's problems continued to build after Brighton eased into the FA Cup fourth round with a 2-0 victory at Old Trafford.

items.title: Two for Reed as Mansfield upset Sheff Utd in thriller
items.summary: Mansfield Town cause one of the shocks of the FA Cup third round with a stunning victory over Sheffield United in a seven-goal thriller at Bramall Lane.

items.title: Arsenal beat Portsmouth thanks to Martinelli hat-trick
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli scores the first hat-trick of his senior career as an Arsenal side showing 10 changes come from a goal down to beat Championship side Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: 'Big personality' Martinelli goes from 'idiot' to hat-trick hero
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli was branded an "idiot" a few days ago - but showed great personality to respond with an FA Cup hat-trick, according to Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta.

items.title: Taty Castellanos edges West Ham past QPR in FA Cup to offer respite for Nuno
items.summary: Forget the magic of the FA Cup, for West Ham the reality of what is soon likely to be a Championship fixture. An indicator that life in the second tier will be no cakewalk. That QPR took them to extra-time will do little for Nuno Esp√≠rito Santo‚Äôs standing, despite a first win since 8 November. There were, though, positives to take in the performance of Taty Castellanos, the Argentinian striker who scored the Hammers‚Äô winning goal. Have West Ham at last ended a search for a striker that has lasted almost as long as their London Stadium tenancy? They‚Äôve looked everywhere. The other goalscorer, Crysencio Summerville, who supplied the assist for the winner, put in one of his better West Ham performances, too. For one cold afternoon only, the Cup drew a veil over Premier League concerns. Continue reading...

items.title: Mansfield stun Sheff Utd as Norwich, West Brom, Hull advance in FA Cup
items.summary: Two goals from Louis Reed against his former club helped Mansfield to a shock 4-3 victory at Sheffield United in the FA Cup.

items.title: Castellanos' first goal ends West Ham's winless run with victory over QPR
items.summary: Taty Castellanos scored his first goal for West Ham to end their 10-game winless run with a 2-1 victory after extra time over Championship side Queens Park Rangers in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Gabriel Martinelli hat-trick guides Arsenal to win at stubborn Portsmouth
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli ended Arsenal‚Äôs last game as public enemy No 1 with Liverpool fans and Gary Neville after his clash with Conor Bradley on Thursday. But the Brazilian was his team‚Äôs saviour against Portsmouth, after the Championship side had threatened briefly to record their first win against the Premier League leaders in 23 attempts after Colby Bishop‚Äôs early strike. Martinelli‚Äôs first senior hat‚Äëtrick included two almost identical headers from corners after an own goal from Andre Dozzell had drawn them level following ‚Äì you guessed it ‚Äì another corner. That takes Arsenal‚Äôs tally from set‚Äëpieces this season to 17 and one wonders where they would be without them. Yet such is their proficiency under Nicolas Jover these days that Mikel Arteta can virtually rely on at least one bearing fruit. Continue reading...
